title: What is Apple Silicon (M1 Chip)? - Krazy Ken's Tech Talk

description: What is the M1 chip and Apple silicon? In short, it's an ARM-based, custom-made, SoC (system on a chip) that Apple will use in their Macs, instead of Intel CPUs. But why is Apple doing this? What about application compatibility? Those questions, and more, are answered in this episode. P.S. enjoy the tragic love story in the beginning.
